name: SPORT! (varglbargl)
description:
SPORT is the sequel to sports. You do sports. WASD, right-click, and left-click are basically all you need to know. Right-click can punt balls* into the air and left-click can knock them out of the park.

https://www.coregames.com/games/0980b4/sport

*"balls," in this instance, is a sporting term that means balls, bowling pins, beans, tubas, and other players.
